modifiers.name: 1. Environment
elements: Terrain, climate, weather systems, flora/fauna, and ecological anomalies.

modifiers.name: 2. Geography & Boundaries
elements: Spatial layout, zones, travel limitations, and structural logic of the world.

modifiers.name: 3. Power Structures
elements: Systems of governance, control, and authority — political, corporate, spiritual, algorithmic.

modifiers.name: 4. Social Order
elements: Class, caste, kinship, community, faction dynamics, and societal organization.

modifiers.name: 5. History & Myth
elements: Origins, wars, lost civilizations, timeline logic, and collective memory or belief.

modifiers.name: 6. Technology & Tools
elements: Level and type of technology: analog, futuristic, arcane, biotech, etc.

modifiers.name: 7. Belief & Knowledge Systems
elements: Religion, science, education, ideology, and pathways to truth.

modifiers.name: 8. Language & Symbol
elements: Forms of communication, sacred symbols, alphabets, or coded systems of meaning.

modifiers.name: 9. Physics & Laws of Reality
elements: Fundamental rules of matter, time, energy, and metaphysics — or their manipulation.
